sentence.Network_en: Imperialism has not been able to subjugate China.
sentence.Network_cn: 帝国主义不能征服中国.

sentence.Network_en: Their costly and futile attempt to subjugate the Afghans lasted just 10 years.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们大动干戈想要控制阿富汗地区，但只持续了10年就无果而终了。

sentence.Network_en: The old Yankees stopped at nothing to subjugate the Irish immigrants.
sentence.Network_cn: 老杨基不顾一切地要制服爱尔兰移民.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 中国人民,百年以来,不屈不挠,再接再厉地英勇斗争,使得帝国主义至今不能灭亡中国,也永远不能灭亡(subjugate)中国。 Thanks to the Chinese people’s unrelenting.
t3 flashcards | Quizlet ... abortive 不成功的 subjugate 征服,使服从,抑制 endemic 地方病.
potentate←→subjectsubjugate vt. 征服,使服从,抑制,克制to bring under control and governance as a subject.
英语专业八级... ... stupor n 昏迷 subjugate vt 使屈服征服使服从克制抑制 subservient adj 屈从的有帮助的有用的奉承的.

list.abs: they were scared that their people would become mindless robots and accept complete cultural subjugation by the Americans .他们害怕法国人会变成毫无思想的机器人并完全接受美国人对他们的文化征服。
When the Empire subjugated the watery world , Ackbar was taken prisoner ., 帝国征服这个水世界后 , 阿克巴沦为俘虏.
the old Yankees stopped at nothing to subjugate the Irish immigrants .老杨基不顾一切地要制服爱尔兰移民。
什么意思... ... temporary subjugation 暂时征服 wifely subjugation 男尊女卑 Exercise subjugation 行使代位继承.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin subjugat- 'brought under a yoke', from the verb subjugare, based on jugum 'yoke'

entry.tran: (尤指在战争中)征服，制服，使屈服
entry.def: If someone subjugates a group of people, they take complete control of them, especially by defeating them in a war.

example.ex: Their costly and futile attempt to subjugate the Afghans lasted just 10 years.
example.tran: 他们大动干戈想要控制阿富汗地区，但只持续了10年就无果而终了。

entry.tran: 使(愿望、渴望)退居其次;使让位于
entry.def: If your wishes or desires are subjugated to something, they are treated as less important than that thing.

example.ex: After having been subjugated to ambition, your maternal instincts are at last starting to assert themselves.
example.tran: 你那被雄心壮志压制已久的母性本能终于开始展现出来。

means.word_mean: 1. put down by force or intimidation;

sentences.sentence: "The government quashes any attempt of an uprising"
"China keeps down her dissidents very efficiently"
"The rich landowners subjugated the peasants working the land"

means.word_mean: 2. make subservient; force to submit or subdue

auth_sentence.content: Their intention of making America a desert if they could not subjugate it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their intention of making America a desert if they could not subjugate it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their intention of making America a desert if they could not subjugate it.

auth_sentence.content: That's why feminism started in the first place, to subjugate men.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's why feminism started in the first place, to subjugate men.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's why feminism started in the first place, to subjugate men.

auth_sentence.content: No less appropriate than quoting the Bible out of context to subjugate women or black people into subservient roles.
auth_sentence.res_content: No less appropriate than quoting the Bible out of context to subjugate women or black people into subservient roles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No less appropriate than quoting the Bible out of context to subjugate women or black people into subservient roles.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+jug牛轭+al……的→共同在轭下
con共同+jug牛轭+ate表动词→共同在轭下[结合]
sub在下面+jug牛轭+ate表动词→套上牛轭→镇压

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"接近,靠近"; 2. 在后面;再; 3. 表示"在下面,次一等,副手"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sub接近,靠近+acid酸→adj.略酸的
sub接近,靠近+adult成年人→adj.接近成年的
sub接近,靠近+arctic北极的→adj.近北极的
sub接近,靠近+arid干燥的→adj.有点干燥的
sub接近,靠近+central中心的→adj.接近中心的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+limin门槛+al……的→在门槛下→在意识之下→潜意识的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+miss放+ive……的→放下面→恭顺的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+terr地+anean→地下的
sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养
sub再+let出租→v.转租 n.转租的房屋
sub在下面,次一等,副手+area区域→n.分区
sub在下面,次一等,副手+branch枝, 分枝, 分部→n.小分支;支[分]店;分公司

stems_affixes.value_cn: 副助理监督, 副助理主教
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub在下面,次一等,副手+dean教长→n.副助理监督, 副助理主教
sub在下面,次一等,副手+editor编辑→n.助理编辑
sub在下面,次一等,副手+head标题→n.小标题, 副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+office办公室→n.分办事处
sub在下面,次一等,副手+officer官员→n.下级军官
sub在下面,次一等,副手+title标题→n.副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+tropic热带+s→亚热带
sub下面+way道路→n.地道,地铁
sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养
sub再+let出租→v.转租 n.转租的房屋
sub在下面,次一等,副手+due债务,义务→减轻
sub在下面,次一等,副手+jug牛轭+ate表动词→套上牛轭→镇压
sub在下面,次一等,副手+merg沉没+e→淹没下去
sub在下面,次一等,副手+orn装饰→在下面装饰[别人]→贿赂
sub在下面,次一等,副手+scrib写+e→在下面写上名字→订购
sub在下面,次一等,副手+side坐→坐下去→平息
sub在下面,次一等,副手+vert转→转下去→推翻
